data.name: GeneralDescriptionTextBox.Text
data.value:
This section is unfinished and non-functional.
Feel free to suggest changes to this section.
Recreating Task Scheduler settings to modify here.

data.name: radioButton1.Text
data.value: Run only when user is logged on

data.name: radioButton2.Text
data.value: Run whether user is logged on or not

data.name: checkBox6.Text
data.value: Restart if the idle state resumes

data.name: checkBox5.Text
data.value: Stop if the computer ceases to be idle

data.name: checkBox4.Text
data.value: Start the task only if the computer is idle for:

data.name: checkBox7.Text
data.value: Start the task only if the computer is on AC power

data.name: checkBox8.Text
data.value: Stop if the computer switches to battery power

data.name: checkBox9.Text
data.value: Wake the computer to run this task

data.name: comboBox3.Items
data.value: Do not start a new instance

data.name: comboBox3.Items1
data.value: Run a new instance in parallel

data.name: label2.Text
data.value: If the task is already running, then the following rule applies:

data.name: checkBox14.Text
data.value: If the running task does not end when requested, force it to stop

data.name: checkBox13.Text
data.value: Stop the task if it runs longer than:

data.name: checkBox12.Text
data.value: If the task fails, restart every:

data.name: checkBox11.Text
data.value: Run task as soon as possible after a scheduled start is missed

data.name: checkBox10.Text
data.value: Allow task to be run on demand
